title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python lib.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user); drop-in replacement for ChatGPT-UI.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async, streaming, POJO mapping, Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama; idiomatic client with chat, pull, delete, and streaming support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with syntax highlighting, history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-like VS Code extension powered by Ollama; local, private code completions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) with multi-arch support and one-line run commands.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration for Ollama generators and embedders; pipeline-ready components.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming, dependency injection helpers, and minimal API sample.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain in a single Docker Compose stack.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama responses into any channel; slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that brings local Ollama models into your workspace with ephemeral feedback.

title: ollama-direnv
summary: Direnv plugin that automatically pulls and caches required Ollama models when you cd into a project.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation for Ollama with CUDA and ROCm variants; declarative model management.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama with Tokio and SSE streaming.

title: ollama-model-zoo
summary: Community-curated collection of custom Modelfiles and fine-tunes ready to pull into Ollama.
